fixedVariables.new_landing_sequence: held_airplanes <<| {x |-> y | x : dom(landing_sequence) & y = landing_sequence(x) - $passed_minutes_since_update & y > 0}

(held_airplanes <<| {x |-> y | x : dom(landing_sequence) & y = landing_sequence(x) - $passed_minutes_since_update & y > 0}) \/ {{AIRPLANES1 |-> 1, AIRPLANES2 |-> 2, AIRPLANES3 |-> 3, AIRPLANES4 |-> 4, AIRPLANES5 |-> 5, AIRPLANES6 |-> 6, AIRPLANES7 |-> 7, AIRPLANES8 |-> 8, AIRPLANES9 |-> 9, AIRPLANES10 |-> 10, AIRPLANES11 |-> 11, AIRPLANES12 |-> 12, AIRPLANES13 |-> 13, AIRPLANES14 |-> 14, AIRPLANES15 |-> 15}~(min(1..15 \ {AIRPLANES1 |-> 1, AIRPLANES2 |-> 2, AIRPLANES3 |-> 3, AIRPLANES4 |-> 4, AIRPLANES5 |-> 5, AIRPLANES6 |-> 6, AIRPLANES7 |-> 7, AIRPLANES8 |-> 8, AIRPLANES9 |-> 9, AIRPLANES10 |-> 10, AIRPLANES11 |-> 11, AIRPLANES12 |-> 12, AIRPLANES13 |-> 13, AIRPLANES14 |-> 14, AIRPLANES15 |-> 15}[dom(landing_sequence)])) |-> random_element({x | x : 1..45 & x /: ran(landing_sequence) & x+1 /: ran(landing_sequence) & x+2 /: ran(landing_sequence) & x-1 /: ran(landing_sequence) & x-2 /: ran(landing_sequence)})}
